trans-unit.source: 1.Enable SSH access to Synology DSM Server. (Optionally) install Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 1.启用 SSH 访问 Synology DSM 服务器。(可选)安装Python 3。

trans-unit.source: 2. Prepare a local folder location for Python modules install.
trans-unit.target: 2.准备好Python模块安装的本地文件夹位置。

trans-unit.source: 3. Download and install pip
trans-unit.target: 3.下载并安装pip

trans-unit.source: 4. Download and install flickrapi (2.4.0)
trans-unit.target: 4.下载并安装flickrapi (2.4.0)

trans-unit.source: 4.1 OPTION #1 (recommended): With PIP (installed in step #3 above)
trans-unit.target: 4.1 方案1(推荐)。带PIP(在上述步骤3中安装)。

trans-unit.source: 4.2 OPTION #2: Mannually
trans-unit.target: 4.2 备选方案2:人工操作。

trans-unit.source: 5. Download and install flickr-uploader
trans-unit.target: 5.下载并安装Flickr-uploader

trans-unit.source: 5.1 OPTION #1 (recommended): With PIP (installed in step #3 above)
trans-unit.target: 5.1 方案1(推荐)。带PIP(在上述步骤3中安装)。

trans-unit.source: 5.2 OPTION #2: Mannually to be run from local folder
trans-unit.target: 5.2 备选方案#2:从本地文件夹手动运行

trans-unit.source: 5.3 OPTION #3: Mannually to be run from ~/apps/Python/bin
trans-unit.target: 5.3选项＃3：手动从 ~/apps/Python/bin

trans-unit.source: https://github.com/jruere/multiprocessing-logging under GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE
trans-unit.target: GNU LESSER通用公共许可证下的https://github.com/jruere/multiprocessing-logging

trans-unit.source: Synology Help Article on Task Scheduler may also be helpful.
trans-unit.target: 有关Task Scheduler的Synology帮助文章也可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Remark: I'm assuming in between each run you keep the contents of the flickrdb control database and do not remove it.
trans-unit.target: 备注：我假设在每次运行之间，您保留flickrdb控件数据库的内容，并且不要删除它。

trans-unit.source: Side note: don't be overwhelmed with this setup. Steps are quite straitghtforward.
trans-unit.target: 旁注：不要对此设置感到不知所措。步骤是很严格的。

trans-unit.source: Download flickrapi-2.4.tar.gz from PyPi.Python.Org.
trans-unit.target: 从PyPi.Python.Org下载flickrapi- 2.4.tar.gz。

trans-unit.source: Download get-pip.py
trans-unit.target: 下载get-pip.py

trans-unit.source: Extract to ~/dev
trans-unit.target: 解压到〜/ dev

trans-unit.source: Extract to ~/dev and run python setup.py install --prefix=~/apps/Python
trans-unit.target: 解压缩到〜/ dev并运行 python setup.py install --prefix=~/apps/Python

trans-unit.source: IMPORTANT NOTE: Make sure to use the --prefix parameter
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：确保使用--prefix参数

trans-unit.source: IMPORTANT NOTE: To avoid messing up with the system files.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：为避免弄乱系统文件。

trans-unit.source: IMPORTANT NOTE: pip allows you to more easily install python related modules/applications.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：pip可让您更轻松地安装与python相关的模块/应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to use the --prefix parameter
trans-unit.target: 确保使用--prefix参数

trans-unit.source: Adjust the run schedule settings, the email notifications
trans-unit.target: 调整运行计划设置、电子邮件通知。

trans-unit.source: Again it depends on FULL_SET_NAME setting and FILE_DIR being an absolute or relative path and the match is initially done by full pathname + filename. So, in your example ~/pictures will expand to a full path so it would recognize the same files and not upload them again.
trans-unit.target: 同样,这也取决于FULL_SET_NAME的设置和FILE_DIR是绝对路径还是相对路径,并且匹配最初是由完整路径名+文件名完成的。所以,在你的例子中~/pictures将扩展为一个完整的路径,所以它将识别相同的文件,而不是再次上传它们。

trans-unit.target: 也兼容Python 3.6和3.7。

trans-unit.source: Automatically removes images from Flickr when they are removed from your local hard drive
trans-unit.target: 从本地硬盘中删除图片时,自动从Flickr中删除图片。

trans-unit.target: 出于安全考虑,避免使用root。

trans-unit.source: Before running uploadr.py make sure you run the command below:
trans-unit.target: 在运行uploadr.py之前,请确保运行以下命令。

trans-unit.source: By re-running the program without the -u opiotn it will go thru your local files and check/search for already loaded pics with same checksum+Set and re-builds the local database.
trans-unit.target: 通过在不使用-u opiotn的情况下重新运行该程序，它将遍历您的本地文件，并使用相同的校验和+设置检查/搜索已加载的图片，并重新构建本地数据库。

trans-unit.source: Check Features, Requirements and Setup remarks.
trans-unit.target: 检查功能、要求和设置备注。

trans-unit.source: Check explanation on "-b" and "-c" options.
trans-unit.target: 检查"-b "和"-c "选项的解释。

trans-unit.target: 配置

trans-unit.target: 请看这个例子来解释如何将文件上传到Flickr的Sets/Albums中。

trans-unit.target: 还创建一个 dev 目录/文件夹，以用作安装之前在其中下载/提取文件/软件包的工作区：

trans-unit.source: Creates Flickr "Sets" (Albums) based on the folder name the media is in (getting existing sets from Flickr is managed also)
trans-unit.target: 根据媒体所在的文件夹名创建Flickr "Sets"(相册)(也可以从Flickr获取现有的Sets)。

trans-unit.source: Files which failed to load previously due to Flickr error 5 ("type not recognized") or 8 ("file to large")

trans-unit.source: First you will need to run script at least one time in a ssh client to get the token file. Refer to the "Task Scheduler (cron)" section above. Then with DSM 6.1, create an automate task, make it run once a day for example, and put this in the textbox without quotes "path_to_your_python_program path_to_your_script". For example, assuming you installed Python package from Synocommunity, command should look like "/usr/local/python/bin/python /volume1/script/flickr-uploader/uploadr.py".
trans-unit.target: 首先,你需要在ssh客户端中至少运行一次脚本来获取token文件。参考上面的 "任务调度器(cron)"部分。然后用DSM 6.1,创建一个自动任务,比如说让它每天运行一次,然后把这个放在文本框里,不用引号 "path_to_your_python_program path_to_your_script"。例如,假设你从Synocommunity安装了Python包,命令应该是"/usr/local/python/bin/python /volume1/script/flickr-uploader/uploadr.py"。

trans-unit.source: Flickr API key (free)
trans-unit.target: Flickr API密钥(免费

trans-unit.source: Flickr-Local: Difference of Flickr to Local pics (for easier reading/tracking)
trans-unit.target: Flickr-本地。Flickr与Local图片的区别(方便阅读/追踪)

trans-unit.source: Flickr: Number of pics indicated by Flickr (may be off by 1 immediately after upload due to Flickr refres)
trans-unit.target: Flickr:Flickr显示的图片数量(由于Flickr刷新,上传后可能会立即减少1张)

trans-unit.source: Follow these guidelines for PIP installation.
trans-unit.target: 请遵循以下指导进行PIP安装。

trans-unit.source: Following runs can be launched unattended:
trans-unit.target: 可以在无人值守的情况下启动以下运行：

trans-unit.source: Go to http://www.flickr.com/services/apps/create/apply and apply for an API key.
trans-unit.target: 转到http://www.flickr.com/services/apps/create/apply并申请API密钥。

trans-unit.source: Go to Control Panel-> Task Scheduler
trans-unit.target: 转到控制面板->任务计划程序

trans-unit.source: Have a few starsand feedback that it is being used by several people.
trans-unit.target: 有几颗星和反馈,它被几个人使用。

trans-unit.source: How it works! An example...
trans-unit.target: 它是如何工作的! 一个例子...

trans-unit.source: I do! As of November 2017
trans-unit.target: 我愿意! 截至2017年11月

trans-unit.source: IMPORTANT: Do not use crontab directly. Having Task Scheduler replaces crontab.
trans-unit.target: 重要:不要直接使用crontab。有了任务调度程序就可以取代crontab。

trans-unit.source: If all files from a folder (and corresponding Album on flickr) are deleted, then the actual Album will be also eliminated. Again, if you do not chnage the FILES_DIR in between runs.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个文件夹里的所有文件(和flickr上相应的相册)被删除,那么实际的相册也会被删除。同样,如果你不在运行之间改变FILES_DIR。

trans-unit.source: If using relative FILES_DIR and two files exist on the same subfolder, it will not be re-uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用相对的FILES_DIR,并且在同一个子文件夹中存在两个文件,将不会被重新上传。

trans-unit.source: If you have the following folders and pics (the name of the flickr Sets/Albums depends on the uploadr.ini file setting FULL_SET_NAME, but I normally use it as False):
trans-unit.target: 如果你有以下文件夹和图片(Flickr的Sets/Albums的名字取决于uploadr.ini文件的FULL_SET_NAME设置,但我通常用False)。

trans-unit.source: Ignores unwanted directories (like ".picasabackup" for Picasa users or "@eaDir" for Synology NAS users) and you can easily add/configure more yourself. Check uploadr.ini config file.
trans-unit.target: 忽略不需要的目录 (例如 Picasa 用户的 ".picasabackup" 或 Synology NAS 用户的 "@eaDir"),您可以轻松地自行添加/配置更多目录。请检查 uploadr.ini 配置文件。

trans-unit.source: In fact,in one particular report I received, this package was causing several conflicts so, please, don't install it.
trans-unit.target: 事实上,在我收到的一个特别的报告中,这个包引起了几个冲突,所以,请不要安装它。

trans-unit.source: Initial Found Files: Number of files found for processing.
trans-unit.target: 初步找到的文件。找到要处理的文件数量。

trans-unit.source: Inspired by:
trans-unit.target: 灵感来自于:

trans-unit.source: Installation also copies to '~/apps/Python/etc' folder the data files uploadr.ini and uploadr.cron
trans-unit.target: 安装还将数据文件 uploadr.ini 和 uploadr.cron 复制到“〜/ apps / Python / etc”文件夹中

trans-unit.source: It simply loads the files. It does not create Albums/Sets.
trans-unit.target: 它只是加载文件。它不创建专辑/套装。

trans-unit.source: Launch from the command line in Daemon mode (-d option).
trans-unit.target: 在Daemon模式下从命令行启动(-d选项)。

trans-unit.target: Linux

trans-unit.source: Local: Number of local pics found.
trans-unit.target: 本地。找到的本地图片数量。

trans-unit.source: Log into your Synology system via Web interface.
trans-unit.target: 透過網路介面登入您的 Synology 系統。

trans-unit.source: Makes dynamic use of the following libraries:
trans-unit.target: 动态使用以下库。

trans-unit.source: Might work on other platforms like Windows also.
trans-unit.target: 可能在Windows等其他平台上也能使用。

trans-unit.source: Multiple loadings in parallel is available (check -p option)
trans-unit.target: 可以并行地进行多次加载(检查-p选项)。

trans-unit.source: No, sorry. I just picked up the language to write this script because python can easily be installed on a Synology Diskstation.
trans-unit.target: 不,抱歉。我只是学了这门语言来写这个脚本,因为在Synology Diskstation上很容易安装python。

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不知道

trans-unit.source: Nope. It's a work in progress. I've tested it as needed for my needs, but it's possible to build additional features by contributing to the script.
trans-unit.target: 不,这是一个正在进行中的工作。这是一个正在进行中的工作。我已经根据我的需要进行了测试,但通过对脚本的贡献,可以建立更多的功能。

trans-unit.source: Not in sets on Flickr: Indicates just that. It may indicate errors if it is bigger than 0, as all uploaded pics by uploadr should be on an Album. What I do normally, is to delete such pics from Flickr directly from the flickr/organize interface. But I've seen other users which have other tools uploading pics to Flickr to ignore this number.
trans-unit.target: Flickr上不在集。表示的就是这个意思。如果大于0的话,可能会显示错误,因为所有上传的照片都应该在一个相册里。我通常的做法是直接从Flickr/organize界面删除这些照片。但我看到其他用户用其他工具上传照片到Flickr时,忽略了这个数字。

trans-unit.source: Now available on Pypi.org for installation also via PIP.
trans-unit.target: 现在在Pypi.org上也可以通过PIP进行安装。

trans-unit.source: On Linux/Unix/Mac based systems, run via crontab
trans-unit.target: 在Linux/Unix/Mac系统上,通过crontab运行。

trans-unit.source: On Synology systems, run with Task Scheduler (Synology/Control Panel)
trans-unit.target: 在Synology系统上,请使用任务调度程序(Synology/控制面板)运行。

trans-unit.source: On the first run you need to authenticate the applicaiton against Flickr.
trans-unit.target: 在第一次运行时，您需要针对Flickr验证应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Optionally convert RAW files (with use of external tool: exiftool by Phil Harvey).
trans-unit.target: （可选）转换RAW文件（使用外部工具：Phil Harvey的exiftool）。

trans-unit.source: Or, for Python 3.5:
trans-unit.target: 或者,对于Python 3.5。

trans-unit.source: Personnaly I avoid PNG files which do not support EXIF info
trans-unit.target: 我个人避免使用不支持EXIF信息的PNG文件。

trans-unit.source: Photos count:
trans-unit.target: 照片数。

trans-unit.source: Pic
trans-unit.target: Pic

trans-unit.source: Place the file uploadr.py in any directory and run via ssh (execution privs required). It will crawl through all the files from the FILES_DIR directory and begin the upload process.
trans-unit.target: 将文件uploadr.py放在任意目录下,并通过ssh运行(需要执行privs)。它将从FILES_DIR目录中爬取所有文件并开始上传过程。

trans-unit.source: Please note the -u masking option does not filter every sensitive information. In particular when DEBUG error level is set.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，-u masking选项不会过滤所有敏感信息。特别是在设置调试错误级别时。

trans-unit.source: Prepare a local folder location for Python modules install
trans-unit.target: 为Python模块的安装准备一个本地文件夹位置。

trans-unit.source: Published on https://github.com/oPromessa/flickr-uploader/
trans-unit.target: 发布在https://github.com/oPromessa/flickr-uploader/

trans-unit.target: PyPi下载统计(截至2018年9月)

trans-unit.source: Python 2.7+ (should work on DSM from Synology (v6.1), Windows and MAC)
trans-unit.target: Python 2.7+(应该可以在 Synology (v6.1)、Windows 和 MAC 的 DSM 上使用)

trans-unit.source: Q: "What about previously existing folders (they didn't seem to get deleted)"
trans-unit.target: 问:"以前存在的文件夹怎么办(它们似乎没有被删除)"

trans-unit.source: Q: "my understanding is that this is a sync script, which means when I later delete a pic from a synced folder, it will get deleted from Flickr"
trans-unit.target: 问:"我的理解是,这是一个同步脚本,这意味着当我以后从同步文件夹中删除一张照片时,它将从Flickr中被删除"

trans-unit.source: Q: Are you a python ninja?
trans-unit.target: 问:你是蟒蛇忍者吗?

trans-unit.source: Q: Do I need to install the "Python Module" from DSM Installation Package?
trans-unit.target: 问:我需要安装DSM安装包中的 "Python模块 "吗?

trans-unit.source: Q: How to automate it with a Synology NAS ?
trans-unit.target: 問:如何使用Synology NAS自動執行?

trans-unit.source: Q: How to read the final report:
trans-unit.target: 问:如何阅读最终报告。

trans-unit.source: Q: I thought I read a mention of checksum as a way to detect file modification: what about the same file in 2 different folders, is it then upoad each time (in a set with the folder name) or only once?
trans-unit.target: 问:我想我读到了一个提到的校验和作为检测文件修改的方法:同样的文件放在2个不同的文件夹里怎么办,是然后每次上载(以文件夹名为一组)还是只上载一次?

trans-unit.source: Q: Is all sensitive information (albums and filenames) masked with the -u option?
trans-unit.target: 问：是否使用-u选项掩盖了所有敏感信息（相册和文件名）？

trans-unit.source: Q: Is this script feature complete and fully tested?
trans-unit.target: 问:这个脚本功能是否完整,是否经过全面测试?

trans-unit.source: Q: What about when I run the script on ~/pictures/parent_folder/folder_A and then later on ~/pictures/parentfolder will the script recongize the folder_A within parentfolder as being the one it uploaded before becaues its content will have matching checksums?
trans-unit.target: 问:当我在 ~/pictures/parent_folder/文件夹_A 上运行脚本,然后在 ~/pictures/parentfolder 上运行脚本,脚本会不会把parentfolder 内的文件夹_A 重新识别为之前上传的那个文件夹,因为它的内容会有匹配的校验和?

trans-unit.source: Q: What about when I sync a folder with the same name of a previously existing folder? (you mention getting existing sets from Flickr is managed also
trans-unit.target: Q:当我同步一个与之前已有的文件夹同名的文件夹时,怎么办? (你提到从Flickr获取现有的套装也是管理的)

trans-unit.source: Q: What happens if the local control Database (flickrdb) is deleted?
trans-unit.target: 问:如果删除了本地控制数据库(flickrdb)会怎样?

trans-unit.source: Q: What if I have different folders to sync?
trans-unit.target: 问:如果我有不同的文件夹要同步怎么办?

trans-unit.source: Q: Who is this script designed for?
trans-unit.target: 问:这个剧本是为谁设计的?

trans-unit.source: Q: Why don't you use OAuth?
trans-unit.target: 问:为什么不用OAuth?

trans-unit.source: Questions & Answers
trans-unit.target: 问题和答案

trans-unit.source: Recognition
trans-unit.target: 认可

trans-unit.source: Recommendation is to use Task Scheduler or cron.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用任务调度器或cron。

trans-unit.source: Recommendation on Synology DSM: do not install/use the "Python Module" from the DSM Packages.
trans-unit.target: 关于Synology DSM的建议：不要安装/使用DSM软件包中的“ Python模块”。

trans-unit.source: Refer to https://www.flickr.com/services/api/upload.api.html for what each of the upload arguments above correspond to for Flickr's API.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅https://www.flickr.com/services/api/upload.api.html，以获取上述每个上载参数与Flickr API对应的内容。

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: 备注

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 所需经费

trans-unit.source: Reuploads modified images as well as Videos (via delete/upload).
trans-unit.target: 重新上传修改后的图片以及视频(通过删除/上传)。

trans-unit.source: Run ./uploadr.py --help for up to the minute information on arguments:
trans-unit.target: 运行 ./uploadr.py --help 以获得有关参数的最新信息：

trans-unit.source: SLEEP_TIME is only used in this case.
trans-unit.target: SLEEP_TIME只在这种情况下使用。

trans-unit.source: Same pic as in Album01 is loaded twice as it's part of a different Album
trans-unit.target: 同一张照片在Album01中被加载了两次,因为它是不同相册的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sample file structure
trans-unit.target: 文件结构样本

trans-unit.source: Set/Album Name (FULL_SET_NAME=False)
trans-unit.target: 设置/专辑名称(FULL_SET_NAME=False)

trans-unit.source: Set/Album Name (FULL_SET_NAME=True)
trans-unit.target: 设置/专辑名称(FULL_SET_NAME=True)

trans-unit.source: Setting your source folder with FILES_DIR
trans-unit.target: 用FILES_DIR设置你的源文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Setup on Synology
trans-unit.target: 在Synology上的设置

trans-unit.source: Skips files that are over a configurable size (max flickr size is about 900MB)
trans-unit.target: 跳过超过配置大小的文件(最大flickr大小约为900MB)

trans-unit.source: So, in a nutshell, too many issues if you play around changing the FILES_DIR location.
trans-unit.target: 所以,总的来说,如果你玩转改变FILES_DIR位置,问题太多。

trans-unit.source: Stores image information locally using a simple SQLite database
trans-unit.target: 使用简单的SQLite数据库在本地存储图像信息。

trans-unit.source: Sub
trans-unit.target: 子公司

trans-unit.source: Summary steps:
trans-unit.target: 摘要步骤:

trans-unit.source: THIS SCRIPT IS PROVIDED WITH NO WARRANTY WHATSOEVER. PLEASE REVIEW THE SOURCE CODE TO MAKE SURE IT WILL WORK FOR YOUR NEEDS. IF YOU FIND A BUG, PLEASE REPORT IT.
trans-unit.target: 本程序不提供任何保证,请仔细阅读源代码,以确保它能满足你的需求。 如果你发现一个错误,请报告。IT:

trans-unit.source: Task Scheduler (cron)
trans-unit.target: 任务调度器(cron)

trans-unit.source: The remark "some Bad files may no longer exist!" indicates that previously recorded badfiles may already been deleted from the local filesystem. Check possible use of "-c" option.
trans-unit.target: "一些坏文件可能不再存在!"这句话表明之前记录的坏文件可能已经从本地文件系统中删除。检查是否使用了"-c "选项。

trans-unit.source: The standard out-of-the-box python 2.7 installed with Synology (on versions up to DSM 6.2 a the time of writing this) is more than enough.
trans-unit.target: Synology 安装的标准开箱即用的 python 2.7 已经足够了(写这篇文章时的版本是 DSM 6.2 以下)。

trans-unit.source: Those people comfortable with the command line that want to backup their media on Flickr in full resolution.
trans-unit.target: 那些使用命令行的人,想在Flickr上以全分辨率备份他们的媒体。

trans-unit.source: To avoid running this command exerytime you log-in into your system, follow the notes on this link to edit file ~/.bashrc and place this command there.
trans-unit.target: 为避免您在登录系统后急于运行此命令，请遵循此链接上的说明来编辑〜/ .bashrc文件并将此命令放置在此处。

trans-unit.source: To check what files uploadr.py would upload and delete you can run the script with option --dry-run:
trans-unit.target: 要检查uploadr.py将上传和删除哪些文件，您可以使用 --dry-run 选项运行脚本：

trans-unit.source: Under "Run Command" include a reference to the uploadr.cron file /full/path/to/uploadr.cron
trans-unit.target: 在“运行命令”下，包含对uploadr.cron文件 /full/path/to/uploadr.cron 的引用

trans-unit.source: Upload a directory of media (pics/videos) to Flickr for showing off your pics on the WEB and as a backup of your local storage.
trans-unit.target: 上载媒体目录(照片/视频)到Flickr,以便在WEB上展示你的照片,并作为本地存储的备份。

trans-unit.source: Upload a directory of media (pics/videos) to Flickr for showing off your pics on the WEB and as a backup of your local storage. flickr-uploader designed primarly for Synology Devices. Also works on Linux, Mac and Windows systems.
trans-unit.target: 将媒体目录(图片/视频)上传到Flickr,以便在WEB上展示您的图片,并作为您本地存储的备份。Flickr-uploader专为Synology设备而设计。也可以在 Linux、Mac 和 Windows 系统上使用。

trans-unit.source: Uploadr saves the (full or relative depending on FILES_DIR) path name for the pics loaded. So, event though you provide a new origin folder, if the previously loaded pics still exist on their original locations, they are not deleted. If they are deleted from such original location or uploadr has no access to them, then they will be deleted from flickr.
trans-unit.target: Uploadr为加载的图片保存(完整或相对取决于FILES_DIR)路径名。所以,即使你提供了一个新的原点文件夹,如果之前加载的图片仍然存在于它们的原点,它们不会被删除。如果它们从原来的位置被删除了,或者uploadr没有权限访问它们,那么它们就会从Flickr中被删除。

trans-unit.source: Uploads both images and movies (JPG, PNG, GIF, AVI, MOV, 3GP files)
trans-unit.target: 上传图像和电影(JPG,PNG,GIF,AVI,MOV,3GP文件)。

trans-unit.source: Usage/Arguments/Options
trans-unit.target: 用途/参数/选项

trans-unit.source: Use upload.cron added to the distribution and adapt to your needs.
trans-unit.target: 使用upload.cron添加到分发中,并根据自己的需求进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Use either "crontab -e" or vi /etc/crontab according to your system.
trans-unit.target: 根据你的系统使用 "crontab -e "或vi /etc/crontab。

trans-unit.source: Use sample file uploadr.cron added to the distribution and adapt to your needs.
trans-unit.target: 使用示例文件uploadr.cron添加到发行版中,并根据您的需求进行调整。

trans-unit.source: What happens to previously loaded pics depends if they still exist and Uploadr can still find them (depending if FILES_DIR was set as an absolute folder or relative folder path)
trans-unit.target: 之前加载的图片会发生什么,取决于它们是否仍然存在,以及Uploadr是否还能找到它们(取决于FILES_DIR是否被设置为绝对文件夹或相对文件夹路径)。

trans-unit.source: Windows
trans-unit.target: 窗口

trans-unit.source: With -d option it runs in daemon mode and checks for files every SLEEP_TIME seconds (as configured on uploadr.ini)
trans-unit.target: 使用-d选项,它在守护进程模式下运行,每隔SLEEP_TIME秒检查一次文件(根据uploadr.ini的配置)

trans-unit.source: With FULL_SET_NAME=False it will go into Album "Sub"
trans-unit.target: 当FULL_SET_NAME=False时,它将进入专辑 "Sub"

trans-unit.source: Yes a file removed locally will be deleted from Flickr.
trans-unit.target: 是的,本地删除的文件会从Flickr中删除。

trans-unit.source: You can find under Assets:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在“资产”下找到：

trans-unit.source: You can then run it from the current folder.
trans-unit.target: 然后你可以从当前文件夹中运行它。

trans-unit.source: You may use this code however you see fit in any form whatsoever. And enjoy!!!
trans-unit.target: 你可以以任何形式使用这个代码,你认为合适。并享受!!!

trans-unit.source: You should get the following depending on how the setting FULL_SET_NAME is set:
trans-unit.target: 根据FULL_SET_NAME的设置方式,您应该得到以下信息。

trans-unit.source: a distribution package Published on https://github.com/oPromessa/flickr-uploader/releases/latest
trans-unit.target: 发布于https://github.com/oPromessa/flickr-uploader/releases/latest的分发包

trans-unit.source: by oPromessa, 2017, V2.8.6
trans-unit.target: 作者:oPromessa,2017,V2.8.6

trans-unit.target: 下载次数

trans-unit.source: exiftool, only if you intend to convert RAW files to JPG. Install instructions here.. Note: You need to also install the DSM Package Perl.
trans-unit.target: exiftool，仅当您打算将RAW文件转换为JPG时。在此处安装说明。。注意：您还需要安装DSM软件包Perl。

trans-unit.target: Flickr-uploader

trans-unit.source: flickr-uploader designed primarly for Synology Devices.
trans-unit.target: flickr-uploader 是专为 Synology Devices 设计的。

trans-unit.source: flicrkapi module. May need to install get-pip.py. (Instructions for Synology DSM below.)
trans-unit.target: flicrkapi模块。可能需要安装 get-pip.py。(Synology DSM 的说明在下面。)

trans-unit.source: hmmm... if you mean "sync a folder" via setting FILES_DIR... it would depend if you use full or relative pathname on FILES_DIR. Check the section "Clarification" above. It will delete the files he cannot find locally.
trans-unit.target: hmmm...如果你的意思是通过设置FILES_DIR来 "同步一个文件夹"...这将取决于你在FILES_DIR上使用的是全路径名还是相对路径名。查看上面的 "澄清 "部分。它将删除他在本地找不到的文件。

trans-unit.source: hmmm... if you mean two subfolders with the same name, to which Set/Album will be added depends on the setting FULL_SET_NAME. Check the section "Clarification" above for example pic042.
trans-unit.target: 嗯......如果您指的是具有相同名称的两个子文件夹,那么将添加到哪个文件夹取决于设置FULL_SET_NAME。检查上面的 "澄清 "部分,例如pic042。

trans-unit.source: portalocker module for Windows systems. Not mandatory for Synology.
trans-unit.target: 適用於 Windows 系統的 portalocker 模組。不是Synology的必修课。

trans-unit.source: same file on two folders loads up twice. Check example above with Album5/pic02.jpg
trans-unit.target: 同一个文件在两个文件夹中加载两次。检查上面的例子,Album5/pic02.jpg。

trans-unit.source: syncing different folders on each run does work and uploads new pics; but uploadr was not originally designed for that.
trans-unit.target: 每次运行时同步不同的文件夹都能正常工作并上传新照片；但是上载程序最初并不是为此设计的。

trans-unit.source: system_name
trans-unit.target: 系统名称

trans-unit.source: the source code packages;
trans-unit.target: 源代码包。

trans-unit.source: the standard mode of operation should be to sync always the same main folder structure with all your subfolder/pics.
trans-unit.target: 标准的操作模式应该是将主文件夹结构与所有的子文件夹/图片同步。

trans-unit.source: uploadr.py will provide you a URL/link which you need to run
trans-unit.target: uploadr.py将为您提供一个您需要运行的URL/链接。

trans-unit.source: use the -a option
trans-unit.target: 使用 -a 选项
